Package com.dua3.utility.concurrent

Interface ProgressTracker<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the task type
All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface ProgressTracker<T>
Interface for progress tracking.

      Returns:
      new dummy ProgressTracker instance
